#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace   std;


      
#define mod 1000000007
#define si 100
#define f first
#define s second
#define rep(i,n) for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
#define rep0(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define rep1(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define rep2(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define endl '\n'
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define v2(x) vector< vector <int> > x
#define pi(x) printf("%d ",x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld ",x)
#define pie(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define plle(x) printf("%lld\n",x)

#ifdef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#else
#define gc getchar
#endif

inline int scan(){
    char c = gc();
    int x = 0;
    bool b=0;
    while(c<'0'||c>'9'){
        {
            if(c=='-')
            b=1;
            c=gc();

        }
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    if(b==1)
        x*=-1;
    return x;
}
ll w[si][si],ncr[si][si];
int main() {
 ll n,i,j,ans=0,t,k,sq;
 
 ncr[1][0]=ncr[1][1]=1;
 rep(i,25)ncr[i][0]=1;
 rep1(i,2,25)
 rep(j,25)
 ncr[i][j]=ncr[i-1][j-1]+ncr[i-1][j];
 cin>>n;
 rep(i,n)rep(j,n)cin>>w[i][j];
 
 rep(i,n)
 {
      rep(j,i-1)
      {
           rep1(k,2,n)
           {
                t=w[i][j]*(int)sqrt(k);
                if(n>2)
                t*=ncr[n-2][k-2];
              
                ans+=t;
               
           }
      }
 }
 
 plle(ans);

 

}
